nodes.text: Rone was a slicer who was the partner of Chio Fain. After slicing into property of the Galactic Empire, Rone and Fain were pursued and attacked by Imperial TIE fighters above Ryarten. Rone distracted the fighters so that Fain could escape into hyperspace, but was killed. During Beilert Valance's hunt for Darth Vader, Fain honored Rone while attacking the Sith Lord.
